                                        // .vuepress/config.ts
import { defineHopeConfig } from "vuepress-theme-hope";

export default defineHopeConfig({
  themeConfig: {
    plugins: {
      mdEnhance: {
        demo: true,
      },
    },
  },
});

module.exports = defineHopeConfig({
  themeConfig: {
    plugins: {
      mdEnhance: {
        demo: true,
      },
    },

                                        const { useState } = React;

export default () => {
  const [message, setMessage] = useState(" å¼ºå¤§");

  const handler = () => {
    setMessage(`ååˆ†${message}`);
  };

  return (
    <div className="box">
      <code>vuepress-theme-hope</code>
      <span id="powerful" onClick={handler}>
        {message}
      </span>
    </div>
  );
};

                                        ::: demo [react] ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°å¼ React Demo

```js
const { useState } = React;

export default () => {
  const [message, setMessage] = useState(" å¼ºå¤§");

  const handler = () => {
    setMessage(`ååˆ†${message}`);
  };

  return (
    <div className="box">
      <code>vuepress-theme-hope</code>
      <span id="powerful" onClick={handler}>
        {message}
      </span>
    </div>
  );
};
```

```css
.box #powerful {
  color: blue;
}
```

                                        export default class App extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { message: "å¼ºå¤§" };
  }
  render() {
    return (
      <div className="box">
        <code>vuepress-theme-hope</code>
        <span id="powerful" onClick={this.handler}>
          {this.state.message}
        </span>
      </div>
    );
  }
  handler = () => {
    this.setState((state) => ({
      message: `ååˆ†${state.message}`,
    }));
  };
}

                                        ä»£ç 
                                        ::: demo [react] ä¸€ä¸ªç±»å¼ React Demo

```js
export default class App extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { message: "å¼ºå¤§" };
  }
  render() {
    return (
      <div className="box">
        <code>vuepress-theme-hope</code>
        <span id="powerful" onClick={this.handler}>
          {this.state.message}
        </span>
      </div>
    );
  }
  handler = () => {
    this.setState((state) => ({
      message: `ååˆ†${state.message}`,
    }));
  };
}
```

```css
.box #powerful {
  color: blue;
}
```

                                        <template>
  <div class="box">
    <code>vuepress-theme-hope</code> is
    <span @click="handler">{{ message }}</span
    >!
  </div>
</template>
<script>
const { ref } = Vue;

export default {
  setup() {
    const message = ref("powerful");

    const handler = () => {
      message.value = "very " + message.value;
    };

    return {
      message,
      handler,
    };
  },
};
</script>
<style>
.box span {
  color: red;
}
</style>

                                        Code
                                        ::: demo [vue] ä¸€ä¸ª Vue Composition æ¼”ç¤º

```vue
<template>
  <div class="box">
    <code>vuepress-theme-hope</code> is
    <span @click="handler">{{ message }}</span
    >!
  </div>
</template>
<script>
const { ref } = Vue;

export default {
  setup() {
    const message = ref("powerful");

    const handler = () => {
      message.value = "very " + message.value;
    };

    return {
      message,
      handler,
    };
  },
};
</script>
<style>
.box span {
  color: red;
}
</style>
```

                                        <template>
  <div class="box">
    <code>vuepress-theme-hope</code> is
    <span @click="handler">{{ message }}</span
    >!
  </div>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  data: () => ({ message: "powerful" }),
  methods: {
    handler() {
      this.message = "very " + this.message;
    },
  },
};
</script>
<style>
.box span {
  color: red;
}
</style>

                                        Code
                                        ::: demo [vue] ä¸€ä¸ª Vue Option æ¼”ç¤º

```vue
<template>
  <div class="box">
    <code>vuepress-theme-hope</code> is
    <span @click="handler">{{ message }}</span
    >!
  </div>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  data: () => ({ message: "powerful" }),
  methods: {
    handler() {
      this.message = "very " + this.message;
    },
  },
};
</script>
<style>
.box span {
  color: red;
}
</style>
```
